I found information about Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima, commonly known as Ronaldo. Here’s a short profile of him:

- **Full Name:** Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima
- **Birthdate:** September 18, 1976
- **Age:** 48 years
- **Birthplace:** Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
- **Height:** 1.83 m
- **Position:** Forward
- **International Team:** Brazil (Former National Player)
- **International Appearances:** 99
- **International Goals:** 62

He is considered one of the greatest football players of all time. For more details, you can check his profile [here](https://www.transfermarkt.de/ronaldo/profil/spieler/3140).

Now, I will go ahead and finish the task. 

Final Answer: Ronaldo Luís Nazário de Lima is a retired Brazillian footballer, famously known for his incredible goal-scoring ability. He was born on September 18, 1976, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. After appearing in 99 matches for the Brazilian national team, he scored 62 goals, marking his legacy as one of football's greats. More details can be found in his profile [here](https://www.transfermarkt.de/ronaldo/profil/spieler/3140).
